resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107606</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107606</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Just Vote!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerechte Stimme!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voix Juste !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Voto Justo!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Voto Giusto!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακριβώς ψηφοφορία!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Voto Justo!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers a set of five lessons to encourage student involvement in the political process (Grades 9-12). Among the topics: what is a good law, the Constitution's role in evaluating laws, what is a good citizen, the history of suffrage, and skills required of an informed voter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet ein Set von fünf Lektionen an, um 
Kursteilnehmermiteinbeziehung im politischen Prozeß (Grade 9-12) 
anzuregen. Unter den Themen: was ein gutes Gesetz, die 
Rolle der Beschaffenheit in auswertenden Gesetzen ist, was ein guter 
Bürger, die Geschichte des Stimmrechts und die Fähigkeiten, die von 
einem informierten Wähler benötigt werden ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre un ensemble de cinq leçons pour encourager la 
participation d'étudiant dans le processus politique (catégories 
9-12). Parmi les sujets : ce qui est une bonne loi, le 
rôle de la constitution dans des lois d'évaluation, ce qui est un 
bon citoyen, l'histoire du suffrage, et des qualifications exigées 
d'un électeur au courant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece um jogo de cinco lições incentivar a 
participação do estudante no processo político (classes 9-12). 
Entre os tópicos: o que é uma lei boa, o papel do 
constitution em leis de avaliação, o que é um cidadão bom, o 
history do suffrage, e habilidades requeridas de um eleitor informed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre un insieme di cinque lezioni per consigliare alla 
partecipazione dell'allievo al processo politico (gradi 9-12). 
Fra i soggetti: che cosa è una buona legge, il ruolo 
della costituzione nelle leggi di valutazione, che cosa è un buon 
cittadino, la storia di suffrage ed abilità richieste di un elettore 
informed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει ένα σύνολο πέντε μαθημάτων για να 
ενθαρρύνει τη συμμετοχή σπουδαστών στην πολιτική διαδικασία 
(βαθμοί 9-12). Μεταξύ των θεμάτων: αυτό που είναι 
ένας καλός νόμος, ο ρόλος του συντάγματος στην αξιολόγηση των 
νόμων, τι είναι καλός πολίτης, η ιστορία της ψήφου, και 
δεξιότητες που απαιτούνται από έναν ενημερωμένο ψηφοφόρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece un conjunto de cinco lecciones para animar la 
implicación del estudiante en el proceso político (grados 9-12). 
Entre los asuntos: cuál es una buena ley, el papel de la 
constitución en leyes de evaluación, cuál es un buen ciudadano, la 
historia del sufragio, y habilidades requeridas de un votante 
informado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107606</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/just-vote</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
